name: Piano Tiles: Tiles Hop 2020
description:
Piano Tiles: Tiles Hop 2020 is the best piano music game awaiting to be played!


Play game to easy to relax and listen music.


Game rules:


• Tap on the black tiles while listening to music. Avoid the white ones. Enjoy classical and pop music, improve your tapping speed.


Features:

Simple graphics, simple game-play, simple rule, and everybody can play the piano.


• High quality sounds.


- Great variety of music styles: Hip-hop, remix and many others;


Piano Tiles: Tiles Hop 2020 is the best piano music game awaiting to be played!
